data.text: @KrstevskaIva [1/2]Hi Iva, we are very sorry you had a poor experience on your previous Austrian flight. We can totally understand your anger and that you have cause for criticism regarding our service.

@PartaliSarah @jirka0099 @staralliance Hi Sarah, have you received a notification that the bag has been located and sent to Larnaca? Only would it really make sense to send somebody to the airport. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@TonCatacrak Hi Ton, we are really sorry to hear that your baggage is still missing and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. I hope you and your baggage will be reunited soon. Kind regards, Derya

@MissValerieM @lufthansa Hi Valerie, I'm really sorry to read about your unpleasant experience during your travel. Please send your request for compensation via this contact form https://t.co/Qtjv8UbMJW. Best regards, Sandra

data.text: @ZGezunt @staralliance Hi, we're sorry you've been affected by a flight cancellation. Please send us a PM with your booking code. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@fivelightsdown Hi, we apologize for the delay to your flight and hope our colleagues at the airport were able to find a solution. Please send us a PM if there is any way we can still assist. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@jirka0099 @staralliance Hi, we are sorry that there are considerable delays and once we get your bag to its destination we are reliant on our partners to deliver it in a timely manner. We are sorry that this did not happen in your case. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Hamdimoza Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@Hamdimoza Hi, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Please be assured that our colleagues know people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag as quickly as they can and reunite each passenger with their luggage. [1/2]
@kasababcia Hi Scott, I´ve answered already your private message. Best regards, Denis

@Saz_Jan Hi, please rest assured my colleagues will contact you as soon as possible. Unfortunately, responses of Customer Relations are currently delayed due to the extraordinarily high volume of incoming inquiries. My apologies for the time waiting. Best regards, Denis
@tenerifealicia Hallo Alicia, bitte nenn uns deine Buchungsreferenz via DM, dann prüfen wir das gerne für dich. Liebe Grüße, Denis
@CedarEdLending Hi Cedar, given the increased requests the processing time is above average. We appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Derya
@mdbergfeld [2/2]baggage at the moment, it´s hard to predict a time frame. I can only ask you for your continued patience. Kind regards, Derya

@mdbergfeld [1/2] Hi Mark, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. We of course understand your anger and are very sorry for any inconvenience caused. Since our colleagues are confronted with a huge amount of delayed
@TamarinTree Hi there, please send us your booking code via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@SusanWi26870576 Hi Susan, please send us your booking code via DM and we can take a closer look into it. Kind regards, Daphne
@Hamdimoza stated. Otherwise, you or she can contact them via desktop version through this online form: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

data.text: @Hamdimoza Hi, we're sorry that she hasn't received her luggage yet. Has she filed a report at the lost & found counter at the airport? She will have received there a Passenger Irregularity Report where the contact from the responsible colleagues is [1/2]

@cemalguzelaydin @EUCouncil Hi there, we're sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. In order to forward your inquiry to the responsible colleague, it is recommendable to fill out the respective online form: https://t.co/0sMmStae9j All information can be found on the website. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @RAzarmgin Hi, sorry we could not back to you earlier. We have a lot of inquiries at the moment. Your DOB was missing which is necessary for every ticket to USA/Canada - we have added it and hope our colleagues will soon issue the ticket. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@tengerrrrr Hello, The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@PaolaLaRotta @assistcard @AXA Dear Paola,
sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessa

data.text:
@krise @belreddragons [2/2] Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. Our respective colleagues will get in touch as soon as they have further info. We apologize for this.
Best regards, Shawn

@krise @belreddragons [1/2]Hi Kris, 
We are sorry to hear that we haven't managed to reunite the luggage with its owner. Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

To mark its 25 years, @staralliance brought together classical dancers and a musician who uses the latest innovations. Watch the entire film at https://t.co/5JquuavHb3!

#StarAllianceFamily #TogetherBetterConnected https://t.co/mvKnV21XrG

urls.title: 25th Anniversary
urls.description: We are better when we are connected. For 25 years, Star Alliance has been bringing people together across the globe to develop new ideas, seize opportunities and make their mark on the world. Find out what happened when we brought together classical dancers and a musician who uses the latest digital innovations, for a sensational p erformance. Kenneth Tindall is regarded as one of the outstanding dance-makers of his generation. He is a freelance choreographer, Resident Choreographer and Director of

data.text: @RAzarmgin Hi, we're sorry, but due to the high amount of inquiries, we can not reply immediately. For rebooking purposes with additional payment, we can not process it here anyways via Social Media. Therefore you would need to contact [1/2]

@ivanroser [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Best regards, Shawn
@ivanroser [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@cemalguzelaydin @lufthansa [2/2] Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. We apologize for this. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text:
@razarmgin Dear Rohum,
we would be happy to help you in this case. Therefore please share as many details as possible with us, so that we can assist you in the best way we can.
We will await your reply and thank you for contacting us.
Best regards, Alessandra

@steph_whittaker @majermi3 Dear Stephanie,
I'm sorry that you are already waiting for so long. Please send me your file reference number XXXX-OS-XXXXXX so we can have a closer look at your complaint. Kind regards, Alessandra

@majermi3 Dear Michal,
Please, be aware that due to high volumes the reply may take longer. Rest assured that my colleagues of Customer Care handle each case individually and carefully.  I appreciate your patience in the meantime. Best regards, Alessandra

@jaysondong Hi Jayson, we're sorry that you haven't received your stroller yet. Please send your inquiry directly via the desktop version on this online form: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Tormentooor Hi there, it is a pdf-data you can fill out and send to vielzos@austrian.com, not an actual link to fill out like an online form. Kind regards, Daphne
@Visionetnerefid @majermi3 Hallo Maria, bitte sende uns dein Anliegen per DM und wir können gerne nachsehen. Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@majermi3 Dear Michal,
did you get a case number?
Kindly share the case number with us so we can have a closer look at your request.
Best regards, Alessandra

@iam_abu_ @berlinairport Hi Abu, sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC
Best regards, Alessandra
@c_kronenberg möchest, kannst du uns gerne deine Fallnummer per DM schicken und wir leiten diese gerne mit einer Urgenz weiter. Liebe Grüße, Daphne [2/2]

@c_kronenberg Hi, es tut uns leid, dass du noch keine Antwort erhalten hast. Das ist natürlich nicht der Service, den wir unseren Gästen bieten möchten. Aufgrund vermehrter Anfragen kann es jedoch zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen, da jede Anfrage individuell bearbeitet werden. Wenn du [1/2]

@goleador28071 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@danhardaker Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you already sent our online form, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Due to the current situation, this can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris
@majermi3 Hi Michal, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Scoopyevans Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

@wortbemantelte Hallo, bitte wende dich an den Kontakt, der auf dem Property Irregularity Report (PIR) zu finden ist. Darauf sind alle Informationen zu deinem Fall vermerkt. Die Ansprechperson dort hilft dir gerne weiter. Best regards, Denis

@zincl [2/2] However, we can only ask you once again to contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding
@zincl [1/2]Hi, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the enormous amount of requests, there can, unfortunately, be longer waiting times.

@zkaimakliotis Hi Zack,we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.However, please contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report or send an email to centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com.

@amgrandits @Lovisa23584224 Hi Alex, we are sincerely sorry for the stress and inconvenience this has caused you. Have you filed a claim at the airport? My colleagues are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to its destination. Best regards, Denis

@myrelusion @nourhanabuzolof Hi Vladimir, I do understand your frustration and your anger. To bring your request to notice I would kindly ask you to fill out our online form on https://t.co/aSAHDN0ZeC
Best regards, Denis

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

data.text:
@JonnySLM Hi, wenn nicht alle Gepäckstücke gefunden/geliefert wurden, wird der Fall noch offen sein und du 
 brauchst nichts erneut melden. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@zincl We are sorry that there is currently a considerable backlog. They will be in touch as soon as they can. For your own privacy reasons please do not post your file reference publicly. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@zincl Hi, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Please be assured that our colleagues know that people need their luggage and are working as hard as they can to process each bag and reunite each passenger with their luggage. [1/2]
@Lovisa23584224 [2/2] We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@Lovisa23584224 [1/2] Hi Lovisa, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. However, we can only ask you once again to contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report.

@ivanroser Hi Ivan, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Denis

@Scervola2 Hi there, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Unfortunately, we- the Social Media Team- have no access to the baggage system. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @369Ruba Hi, I'm sorry for the delay to your luggage. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to our baggage systems. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report. You can update the address online: https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33  Kind regards, Lyndsay

@bes85548054 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Chris

@WettensteinYam Hi, I apologize for the delay to your luggage. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to our baggage systems. Please refer to the contact on your PIR or email CentralBaggage.Tracing@austrian.com Kind regards, Lyndsay

@marshallreport Hi Jon, please be assured that our colleagues are trying their utmost to reunite all passengers with their baggage as fast as possible. Due to the current backlog, this can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Chris

@cemalguzelaydin Hi Cemal, please be assured that our colleagues try their utmost to reunite all passengers with their baggage as fast as possible. Due to the current backlog, the processing can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Chris

@vojteji [2/2] Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Property Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected. You can also send an email to viellos@austrian.com

@vojteji [1/2] Hi there, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage.

@SpencerCryder Hi Spencer, please get in contact with us via DM. I´ll then send you the right link and your ticket information. And please mind not posting your ticket information publicly in order to avoid misuse. Kind regards, Derya
@LoetvVeghel [2/2] Unfortunately, we cannot give a timeframe for reimbursements but our colleagues try to process each claim as efficiently as possible. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@LoetvVeghel Hi, the baggage questionnaire form enables our colleagues to identify luggage more easily in rare cases where the label has come off or where customs may be an issue (it is just a procedure but can be helpful) [1/2]

@norbertsteelez Hi, you should have received an automated response that your inquiry has been received? Our colleagues will be in touch as soon as they can. We apologize that there are currently longer waiting times for a response. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@Tormentooor Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris
@LoetvVeghel Hi Loet, please send your request for compensation via the following online form https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@CedarEdLending Hello Cedar,
If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com.
Important: List the contents of the missing bag as precisely as possible. This makes it easier for us to search for it.
Best regards, Alessandra
